What we did Working principles

Ability - Insight #8

There’s varying levels of maturity

We believe...

Some areas are more process mature - they’ve realised it’s importance and dedicated time and resource to it, whereas in other places it’s left to individuals to try to get it sorted and embedded.

Because we've seen and heard...

Some teams have dedicated risk experts embedded

With teams allocated to managing risk

Whereas other areas it’s done side of desk by an individual

People have to chase and pester people to get them to take action

Areas such as insurance and legal services have to been compliant as they are in regulated industries

User need #7

When I’m managing risk
I need everyone to be able to update their own areas of responsibility
So that I don’t have to waste time and effort gathering them all together

User need #9

When I’m managing my risks
I need to know and share what the risk roles and responsibilities are
So that it’s clear who should do what

User need #17

As a risk colleague
I need to understand why I’m being asked to work in a certain way.
So that I can recognise the benefits and can act on it accordingly.
